solution_line_template: First find the total number of strands the two of them can cut per minute: {hannah_cut_rate} strands + {son_cut_rate} strands = <<{hannah_cut_rate}+{son_cut_rate}={combined_cut_rate}>>{combined_cut_rate} strands

Then divide the total number of strands by the number of strands they cut per minute to find the number of minutes it takes to cut all the strands: {total_strands} strands / {combined_cut_rate} strands/minute = <<{total_strands}/{combined_cut_rate}={time_to_free_son}>>{time_to_free_son} minutes
